text: Does protection from a color prevent all damage, targeting, and blocking from that color?
Can a creature with indestructible be destroyed by lethal damage?
Can you activate a tap ability of a creature that has just entered the battlefield and has summoning sickness (without haste)?
Can you cast an instant during your opponent’s turn?
If a spell has already resolved, can you counter it?
If you control two legendary permanents with the same name, must you put one into the graveyard?
Does the stack operate in last-in, first-out order?
Can you cast a sorcery during your opponent’s turn?
Does a card’s text override a general game rule if they conflict?
If you must draw a card from an empty library, do you lose the game?
Does Trample allow excess combat damage to go through blockers to the defending player?
Can a planeswalker be attacked directly by creatures if not blocked?
Does vigilance mean a creature doesn’t tap when it attacks?
Does flash let you cast a creature on an opponent’s turn?
Can you use an ability tied to tapping a permanent if that permanent is already tapped?
Can you pay mana using future mana from an effect that produces it next turn?
If a spell says it can't be countered, can it be countered by another card?
Does double strike deal both first-strike and regular damage?
Does scry let you look at cards and choose to put some on top or bottom of your library?
If you draw more than seven cards, can you keep them all if no other effect limits your hand size?
